entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:23 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
